name: 捕快阿七：病镇 Bailiff A Qi:Sick town
name_original: 捕快阿七：病镇 Bailiff A Qi:Sick town
description:
Background Introduction:

The ordinary bailiff Aqi is a temporary staff member under the Baiyun Town Yamen, only to make a living.

The sudden epidemic swept through this area, leaving everyone at a loss.

Seeing various situations, Aqi launched an investigation into the epidemic.

Faced with the manipulation of power by big people, small people also have things in their hearts that they want to change.


Game content:

This game is a storyline oriented RPG.

Taking the plot as the main direction for adventure, the process involves slightly different turn based battles,

As the plot unfolds, the event unfolds in its entirety.


Game features:

  • Round based combat with sufficient decision-making time

  • Easy mode available for players who only want to watch the plot

  • You can decide whether to encounter enemies at any time

  • Add the concept of "distance" to make the combat process more variable

  • Always fighting alone

  • Different from the character growth method of "gaining experience and then upgrading"

  • Three different endings
